channel	forward	backward
π⁻π⁰$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁻	0.9947323889844155	0.9958241218373863
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁰	1.0189142716777204	1.0178225388247495
π⁰π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁺	0.9845792734517863	0.9881274052239417
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$σ	0.9996657754010695	1.0034536541889483
2$\times$(π⁰π⁰$\leftrightarrow$σ)	1.0066844919786095	0.9901960784313725
# SMASH-1.7
